MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the CH60 postcode area of Heswall, affecting properties in The Moorings and surrounding area.  This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:20AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:15PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:05AM on 12th  November 2020
